revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Petalburg Woods |image = [[File:Petalburg Woods.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Petalburg Woods. |tokens = 12,000 |location = South of Rustboro City. }} '''Petalburg Woods''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !! Base Health !! Trainer !! Pokémon !! Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !!
